website_summaries.verdict: The wireless, noise cancelling Sony WH-1000XM2 delivers strong audio performance that can be sculpted to taste using the free app.
pros: Powerful audio performance with fine-tunable EQ (in app)
Solid noise cancellation with adjustable parameters (in app)
cons: Noise cancellation has subtle effect on audio

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: After years of trying to muffle a sometimes-noisy office with in-ear earphones, changing cable every couple of months, this is a very welcome change. Simply a different experience. After hours of listening to music quietly enough, not to damage your hearing, and with enough isolation from the outside world not to be bothered by people talking on the phone next to you, I'm happy to say this has been a very good purchase. Environments that I previously didn't like before because I could not focus, are now perfectly fine for work, study. And the quality of sound is indeed superior.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones available
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of nouse cancelling headphones for use in the gym. I tested the top end options and although the sound from the Bose was amazing I listen to a lot of heavy metal / bass heavy music and I just couldn’t get the depth of sound I wanted. I went for the Sony and haven’t been disappointed, they are amazing. I can listen to my music at a much lower level (saving my ear drums), I don’t hear any of the booming music that the gym plays and they stay put throughout my training session. I am a bodybuilder and these things can even withstand heavy deadlifts. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Great for music, etc but horrible for calls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these few months back as part of black friday and on the back of reviews on Amazon and a friends advise. It has very horrible call quality. Picks up every noise and that too it is too loud at the other end that the person stops speaking. For the person wearing this, all the noise gets cancelled. Great for music, etc. Horrible for calls. I have sony SBH60 which costs 50GBP and the call quality is far better. Music is also good.
customer_reviews.author: KGM

customer_reviews.title: I have not tried the BOSE and maybe they are more comfortable but i don't have any regrets with the SONY ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the product today after spending a lot of time comparing this with the BOSE QC35. My primary concern was the comfort... I have not tried the BOSE and maybe they are more comfortable but i don't have any regrets with the SONY product (no comfort problems so far). The only thing I didn't realise is that there is a choice between the ANC functionality OR Google Assistant/SIRI using the hardware switch, using the app you can dynamically switch between the 2. For me I would rather keep it as ANC so it doesn't matter. Sound quality is good and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A whole new sound world
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancelling works extremely well cutting out commuting noise but also at home both internal and external noise. There is a slight white noise hiss as a result but unnoticeable as soon as you listen to audio. Works well with the iphone app and great to be able to customise settings and do some equalisation through that. I also had no problem with using a bluetooth transmitter for TV and CD player etc. Very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of headphones, definitely worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I bought it knowing it was a good set of headphones but I wasn't sure if it was worth the money so I waited for a decent sale. These headphones aren't the MOST comfortable because my ears does get quite warm/sweaty at times but that's the outcome of having cups that isolate noise passively as well as actively. These cans are terrific for blocking out noise that normally annoy/irritate me throughout my commute. I already feel like my hearing will last longer thanks to these cans.
customer_reviews.author: Nishant G.

customer_reviews.title: Small earpads and uncomfortable headband.
customer_reviews.text: Sound and bass excellent and liked the swipe controls. Noice cancelling not great. Found them very uncomfortable over ears after 10 mins as pads quite small and a lot of pressure on head from the most uncomfortable headband. Not a great look as they stick out from ears so much. Exchanged for Bose Quiet Comfort 35ii. Night and day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Munro

customer_reviews.title: Best in class wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, but they do leave my ears sore after a day of wearing them as the drivers push up against my lobes. (I have a medium sized head) Other than that it's a joy to listen to music on these and the noise cancellation is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Moecchi

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones with a great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some noise cancelling headphones for flights to replace a pair that broke. Some internet research guided me to these. Like all over ear headphones, they're quite bulky. However, they're very comfortable to wear, give excellent noise cancelling (great if you want to shut out noise to get some sleep), and also excellent sound. The headphones are very well constructed and they come with a rigid carry case to protect them when carrying them in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: QC35 beating quality
customer_reviews.text: I researched these for a long time, and finally got them on a cyber Monday “deal”. The sound quality is almost comparable with the B&W PX, and the noise cancelling is arguably better than the defining Q35s. What gets these above the rest is the features. They are well made, leather is great, gesture control is really cool and the app does some great stuff. Particularly cool, but potentially a bit gimmicky, is the voice focus and ability to make the music come from different angles. There is a newer version of these, with battery and feature upgrades, but for the price you aren’t going to get anywhere near this quality anywhere else. Well done Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Cappin A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: As somebody with a noisy commute, these have been a godsend. The ANC is excellent and, with only background noise, you will not hear anything over your music. Even the Central line can't penetrate it! Sound quality is excellent and I am glad that I no longer need to crank up my volume all the way just to hear anything. Battery life is so good I often forget they need to be charged. I can heartily recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gorton

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! Bought for long haul flights, bus to work, and for at home when the neighbours have awful crooning music on loud!. Put them on, set the noise cancelling, instant peace and quiet!! Add background music on flights and still get to sleep (neck pillow needed as you can't rest your head on these). Excellent sound for listening to metal/rock.
customer_reviews.author: John J Scarrott

customer_reviews.title: Very functional headset
customer_reviews.text: I love these headsets, only notes: it is common for them to start "clacking", send them back to warranty. The battery lasts for a long time, but it does NOT warn when it is low, just a "please recharge your headset" and just dies, on top of that, you cannot charge them and use them at the same time. Other than that, noise-canceling is amazing (better than the competition cough cough), the battery lasts for a long time (being one of the reasons I'm always caught off-guard), very comfortable, the touch controls work very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb cans for watching TV via Blueooth
customer_reviews.text: I returned some Plantronics headphones due to lip sync issues via Bluetooth from an AV receiver - these have no lip sync issues with my Sony STR-DN1080 so I am very happy. They are light and comfy too. Noise cancelling is pretty good and I couldn't even hear the washing machine in the kitchen when I was in there until I took them off!! I compared these to a friends Bose QuietComfort35s and they are very similar.
customer_reviews.author: J. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Consider Replacement Policy
customer_reviews.text: I got a replacement but a different model (after original headphones became faulty). Now stuck with a lower quality set of headphones that I'm unlikely to use. Very disappointed with whole experience and I've now wasted a lot of money. Rating based on replacement model and replacement experience.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Radio

customer_reviews.title: Overall great, they're slightly uncomfortable to wear at this price range though.
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, nice bass too. I like that they are full of features. All headphones brands should follow Sony on that one. Love the touch controls. They are probably not the most comfortable at this price range, they're comfortable enough for long wear. But I've worn more comfortable headphones before for cheaper. A lil bit on the heavy side too. But what can you expect when they have all that tech inside them. Overall great headphones. Noise canceling is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Hamse

customer_reviews.title: Very decent
customer_reviews.text: Live to complain. But can't. Takes a while to mould to ear. I have been told functionality wise it is better than Bose. With price comparison in mind this is a great product. I am satisfied. I'm not a sony only person. Bose is perhaps better. But if money is no object then I suggest b and w. Or perhaps more expensive. Quality battery noise cancellation comfort durability. 9/10
customer_reviews.author: adrian a.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but it makes my ears sweat.
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound cancelling. If you connect to your phone app you have even more options including wind cancelling which works really well. There is also an update that enables the use of "google now" on android. Sound quality is excellent. No real noticable delay if using to watch films etc on bluetooth. Drops a star due to comfort. My ears get warm and start sweating quickly, as commented by many others.
customer_reviews.author: Vstar

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but warm!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and noise cancelling but can get hot on the ear. I have also found that the earphone generates a “positive pressure” in the ear which is a little disconcerting until you get used to it Edit 5 March 2019...... one issue I have noticed is the Bluetooth once connected is persistent, this means that the device has to be disconnected from one device at the device before it will be able to connect to another. Whilst this is not a problem usually, last week one of my kids had connected to it and I was running around all devices to find which one to remove the connection from!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Mills

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, astounding sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, astounding sound. For the price, you'd hope so. The start-stop doesn't work as well with my Android phone as I'd like, but it's manageable and an easy flaw to overlook given the quality of the sound. I use this at work to play white noise to block out the sounds of the office, and it puts me into my own little world.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: My hears say thank you
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to Black Friday I’m now the owner of "like new" Sony Bluetooth headphones and I must say that this "sound cancelling" is really an improvement. The sound quality is not much better than my old headphones and is just very good, as usual with Sony, but this is not the main point. Thanks to sound cancelling I am now able to hear my favourite songs or podcasts in every situation like in a train station or during a flight. I don’t need to pump up the volume and hurt my hears anymore. But be careful on the gate as you won’t hear the train coming.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. The noise cancelling is superb allowing you to immerse yourself fully into the music. Connecting via Bluetooth is flawless with a good range. SQ is simply superb. I particularly like the gesture controls which allow you to easily go to next or previous tracks, raise or lower volume, temporarily override the noise cancelling letting you hear and speak to another person. I have owned Sennheiser HD595's for about ten years and I thought the SQ was very good on those until I heard the Sony's. Very highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing, I have no cons. I loved these so much I bought a pair for my partner. She uses them all the time as well. They have changed the way I travel, planes and tube rides. The sound quality is really good, the noise cancellation is fantastic and the touch controls on the earpiece are really good. I have had no issues and no breakages or cracks of any kind appearing in the cracks and it has been over a year of daily usage.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Superb noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I own quite a few headphones, of which four are noise-cancelling. These are by far the most expensive headphones I have purchased and the noise cancellation is superb, by far the best of the ones I own. I feel it was money well spent. They are very comfortable and the quality of the sound is excellent. They also come with a nice case. Perhaps if you normally buy expensive headphones you may not consider these to be anything special but I don't and I think they are superb. I'm not sure I'll ever be able to go back to cheaper headphones now.
customer_reviews.author: ISB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sony Active Noise Cancelling headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are way better than my previous sony MDR-ZX770BN. The fact that adapts to the environment it is a big plus. Sound wise is very pleasant and the app allows you to tweak the equalizer and play the music as you like in addition to the player I use. It's a good thing to have for media streaming from amazon music or spotify as those players do not have any sort of equalizer. I highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Badea

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling is incredible, comfort and battery life too. Sound is 4.5* though.
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling is incredible. Battery life too. Comes with a surprisingly good app. The ambient pass through of voices if you want it is really clever and effective. Only down side is I'd say they don't go loud enough. They certainly can play loud, but they're just a shade low if you're really wanting to pump it up, and I'm far from the kind of person who is trying to blast them out constantly. I've noticed they can get a bit muddled at that top volume too (which is about 75% of my previous Philips)
customer_reviews.author: A. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for a big expense item
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy XM2 phones rather than XM3 as they are still available and around half the price (and they were only launched a couple of years ago anyway). Equivalent Bose phones possibly just have the edge on sound quality, but not anything else and my old Bose fell apart after four years of (admittedly heavy) use which is not great for £150 cost. These are smart, comfortable, interactive with the linked device and have a long long battery charge (with a nice lady to tell you how much battery you have left).
customer_reviews.author: RJMK

customer_reviews.title: They're a good pick for everyone
customer_reviews.text: They’re a superb all-round package that excel in every area. The sensors built in to detect whether you’re on a train or plane, out walking or sitting at your desk, and will automatically adjust the balance of the noise-cancelling to make sure it’s working hard enough, while still letting in some of the outside world if necessary. And most impotently they are premium over-the-ear headphones that provide excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sony headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought some Beats Studio 3 but they didn’t seem worth £250 and weren’t the most comfortable headphones, so I decided to buy some “Used - Like New” Sony’s. These headphones are so much more comfortable than the Beats and the sound quality is much better too. Will be sending the Beats back and keeping these - really impressed. They looked brand new when I got them too - the description said damaged box but it wasn’t damaged at all and came with all of the paperwork and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound a noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is well balanced, having a very precise top end and a rich deep bass. These are the first pair of noise cancelling headphones I have owned, but I have tried quite a few before and only the very very expensive top end Bose are as good. The Sony M3 are better, but only just and you are paying over £100 more for them. I have only owned them for a couple of months, so cannot comment on durability, but they seem well made and sturdily built.
customer_reviews.author: jem

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pair of headphones I've ever had. Take my comment with a pinch of salt tho, I've also never had a headphone with these price range before. If you use noise cancelling without music you can still hear outside a bit when music is on it blocks almost everything. Even in tube i don't hear anything. Could be dangerous to use it on bike etc. Sound quality is really good on bluetooth and cable connections, clear sound with strong bass.
customer_reviews.author: Alper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for office use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted earphones with ambient sound so I can hear in an office. These work perfectly and the sound quality is second to none. Really solid battery life and come with an aux cord for a backup. Couldn't recommend these enough if you can justify the price. Only negative is they sit high on your head but this was fixed in the M3's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I’ve made all year
customer_reviews.text: A colleague told me that these headphones totally revolutionised his commute. I thought these were rather bold claims but since I was searching for new over the ears, noise cancelling headphones and decided to chose these. Well, he was right! I went from in ear buds to these... no more tangled wires, excellent connectivity, putting them on is like stepping in your own little bubble. I’m on the train two hours a day and these have helped me revise for an exam, relax with Netflix, enjoy a new piece of music... love!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent noise cancelling, especially on a small plane. Very impressed by the comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I wore them from door to door via train (3 hours), plane (4 hours) and car (1 hour), with exceptional noise cancelling and sound quality. The comfort through out was a non an issue, I could almost say, I forgot I was wearing them. I bought them especially to block out the small aircraft noise, and I couldn't have been more impressed. Definitely worth the money! The ambient to noise cancelling feature, by placing your fingers on the ear cuff is really handy, for quick conversations.
customer_reviews.author: Oneg

customer_reviews.title: As you'd expect with Sony's premium build quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Regrettably I bought this a couple of months before the third generation headphones came out, but still these are a great buy (especially with the discount now applicable). The battery life is great and the sound quality Judy perfect. Perfect for the London commute on the tube as it does block out most of the roar/screeching of the train. Now to contemplate whether to sell these for the newer version... Ho hum...
customer_reviews.author: GrumpyGit

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got them in the sale...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, good sound, noise cancelling great. Just don't understand the headband. I have a big head and I have to use it on the smallest setting. Who are they catering for? I'd like it to be a bit tighter if possible. Very strange. Occasionally cuts out but not often enough to notice or complain. Battery life incredible. Only other gripe is the upper limit of volume is rather quiet too. My ears are fine, trust me I don't have hearing issues. Yet, anyway! Overall I'm happy with them, glad I got them in the sale for £200. Wouldn't pay more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Miller

customer_reviews.title: great headphones! Can't fault it for anything - very ...
customer_reviews.text: great headphones! Can't fault it for anything - very comfortable, great sound, great noise cancelling technology, battery is great, great mobile app too... I love it! I use it for mainly for commuting and programming, but also great for airplanes etc.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Macedo

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling what a joke
customer_reviews.text: Pathetic used these on a flight as noise cancelling which work very well for ten minutes or so and then they turn off which render them useless if your trying to take a sleep on a long haul flight Can only pair one device at a time again a pathetic show. I believe it’s criminal negligence for the money paid out for supposedly high end set of cans I will never buy The Sony brand ever again rant over
customer_reviews.author: Anna D

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding noise cancelling, brilliant in all other aspects, could be louder (minor gripe)
customer_reviews.text: These are everything the reviews said they would be. My only gripe would be that they could go a little louder, even with the Sony Headphone app and the equaliser bumped to 11 these won't make you deaf (probably a good thing). The noise cancelling is outstanding (I work 2 feet from loud machinery and you wouldn't know it was there when it's on),
customer_reviews.author: Al B

customer_reviews.title: Noise cancelling cuts out after a short time.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones primarily to use for noise cancelling. However, I quickly realised that noise cancelling cannot be used solely for more than a few minutes. Checking on the web highlighted that other customers had experienced the same problem and that there is no simple way to resolve this issue. Apparently Bose sell similar headphones where noise cancelling can be used independently. I therefore returned the Sony headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Works with a free app and once you set it up and adjust the equalizer it truly sounds amazing. I have used on a long bound flight and works fantastically. The only negative issue is that you cannot use them while charging. However even after a long bound flight (London to San Francisco via Dallas) I still had 70% battery.
customer_reviews.author: Lee T

customer_reviews.title: Block out the incessant whine of life and indulge in sensory pleasure
customer_reviews.text: Superb headset, arguably as good as the latest incarnation with a significant saving. My evenings are now filled with my music or TV programmes whilst paired to my mobile device rather than my partners shouting soaps. Worth the money just for the Libération. Functionality is solid, range is roughly 15metres, set is no more difficult than any other Bluetooth device. Thoroughly recommend this wonderful gift to man.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, great sound, and love the gesture-based controls
customer_reviews.text: Top quality sound reproduction & great battery life. Only criticism is that the battery life indicator is by spoken word when you switch them on (no digital read out) and I've found it to be very inaccurate. But this is a general criticism of headphones & I'm not aware of any quality models (such as these) that have such a feature. Al in all...worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Woods

customer_reviews.title: Why did i debate these or the QC35s so long !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I debated between these and the QC35s for ages - way too long really. Both are excellent. Simply these fit me better and Amazon had an excellent offer on (£200). Noise cancelling is great. Sound is excellent. I like the google assist button feature and the ability to hear ambient sound by covering the right side. Would buy again in an instant.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Sony wh-1000m2
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling mode seems perfectly awesome for me. But honestly the sound qulity is not so outstanding just normal, even though I still love it. After long time wearing you will feel your cheek and ear relatively uncomfortable. So, just reduce the time you wearing even you love music and this head phone fairly much.
customer_reviews.author: WENHAN JI

customer_reviews.title: The best you can buy. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I’ve ever owned. These bad boys have saved my sanity on so many flights. Can you put a price on not listening to other people? I think not.
customer_reviews.author: golden thunder fist

customer_reviews.title: The cat’s meow!
customer_reviews.text: Although apprehensive to buy from Marketplace rather than direct from Amazon, these arrived as advertised, new and a genuine product so kudos to the seller. I’m very impressed with the performance of the headphones. Sound quality is immense, noice cancelling is impressive and they are comfortable to wear. Feel, look and perform like a quality product. Great.
customer_reviews.author: PedallingSquares

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with these Sony headphones, see my comments below. Clear and crisp sound quality.. Excellent Noise Cancelling. Easy to use touch controls for volume etc. Connected these headphones via bluetooth to my Android phone and my Laptop without any issues. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Fearn

customer_reviews.title: Better than Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I dislike about the product. Excellent noise cancellation, fantastic range of sound, comfortable to wear, long battery life, good signal range supported by a first class phone app. Far better sound than Bose QC, and the noise cancelling is better than PXC550, especially if you wear glasses.
customer_reviews.author: roobix

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I’ve heard, really comfy and feel top tier. I was a bit worried about the comfort complaints but personally these are more comfy than my old bose quiet comfort. Don’t listen to the whining about jaw pressure, they must just have weak jaws
customer_reviews.author: Luke M.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Great sound, high-quality headphones and most importantly great noise-cancelling. Noise pollution is always an issue especially if you are flying or using other public transportation. Also, they work very well for studying, reading or listening to music/podcast. Can gladly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Edvin Hasangjekaj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect or very close too
customer_reviews.text: Not much to complain about, get warm inside during hot day or long walk outside, rested on many flight - more than approved V3 is now available and even better
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Had these for a year now, still great!
customer_reviews.text: Positives: Good sound quality Good sounds control Good battery life Comfortable Durable Negatives: Shows some scratching The pressure of the noise cancelling can be a little uncomfortable when you first get it Ears get very hot and sweaty when used during exercise
customer_reviews.author: Rose A

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, noise-cancellation, sound and software UI. Way better than my Bose QC 35 in my opinion. The only slight problem with it is the touch sensor, it can be a bit unresponsive every once in a while. Nothing serious enough to sully the experience though. Would highly recommend 9/10.
customer_reviews.author: Awwal

customer_reviews.title: A good compromise between convenience and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really good for use in the office, allowing a freedom of movement that cabled cans don’t. The sound quality is pretty good for the price and convenience. I haven’t yet heard them with an LDAC source but with AptX HD they are a good compromise given the convenience and noise cancelling. It is worth using an AptX HD transmitter rather than a straight up AptX one. They can, as others have said, cause a little warming up of the ears, but a short break every so often see to that. They have been getting several hours a day usage since they arrived!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones, glad I bought them. Noise cancelling works really well and have been great on a few long haul flights I’ve been on. Great sound quality, really crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: james thorn

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: To anyone thinking of buying these... DON'T! The cable provided broke within 20 days of use. I contacted Sony's customer support who have not solved the issue and it has now been a month of emailing back and forth. Very disappointed with lack of quality and care for customers. I thought Sony were a good company. Buy the Bose QC-35 instead as I'm sure they won't mess you about and provide you with faulty accessories. This pair of headphones have fantastic sound quality. But don't expect any compensation for free if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Perran Hugo King

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how I managed to survive noise offices to long without this headphone. It's amazing how productive I can get with this on and some white noise / nature sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto T Uehara

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase to date
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them on Black Friday thinking it was the XM3's. Only when I received the headphones I understood my mistake, but little did I know that I didn't loose that much when compared to the XM3's. The quality is great, the build is great, the earcup size is great, noise cancelling is state of the art. For an average consumer with an average head and ear size these headphones are a steal. The only difference for me between these ones and 3's is the charging port type. Could be type-C, but it's not a life-changing thing.
customer_reviews.author: Average consumer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Call Quality. Great sounding headphones for music
customer_reviews.text: Terrible call quality. Unfortunately you can barely use these to make calls. Outside noises are amplified to you and your caller. Otherwise these sound great, look slick and only a smidge less comfy than the Bose QC35's. Touch controls are a faff. Give me a button in a well thought-out place any day!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J T

customer_reviews.title: Great for normal noise cancelling, terrible for phonecalls
customer_reviews.text: They are great for normal noise cancelling, however there is a known design floor with them that causes them to flip to amplifying background noise when taking phone calls, makes them pretty unusable for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Simply great.
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and comfortable to wear. Look & sound great. I have been a BOSE person for years, so thought I'd try SONY for a change as these were getting great reviews. So not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Im glad i bought em! Pricey tho.
customer_reviews.text: These heads sound great full of bass and warmth and clarity. they are comfortable to wear for a couple of hours straight at least. They come with a male to male 3.5mm jack cable for old wired connections if you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Daze

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Sony's WH100XM2 have blown me away with its sound level quality. The product is strong and sturdy and the battery life is so long and I don't even when the last time it went dead - suffice to say I am very impressed with this product and confident in saying they really are the best out there amongst the pick of high-end headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of the tree
customer_reviews.text: It's simple: sound quality is amongst the best, noise cancelling is amongst the best, a peer of market leaders like bose qc35. Battery life is very good too, easily going for a couple of flights or work days. If you work in a noisy office and/or travel frequently, this will save your sanity.
customer_reviews.author: SailingSailing96

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase, great Price and good delivery
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my son for Christmas, they ate absolutely blinding in every way, I have compared with my own Bose wired noise cancelling headphones which are about 7 years old and I would say the Sony noise cancelling headphones were superior to my old Bose.
customer_reviews.author: The B's Nest

customer_reviews.title: Fanastic headphones - Better than QC 25
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to replace my old Bose QuietComfort 25s. The sound quality and active noise cancellation are both a significant improvement. The app is next to worthless however with most functions being accessible on the headphones themselves. The only downside is the lack of an auto power off function. Most headphones I have used can detect when music is no longer playing and auto power off., these headphones don't do that leading to accidental flat batteries
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones fairly regularly especially when at the gym. They are great for noise cancellation and helps my productivity at the gym. When fully charged, the batteries last quite a bit before needing to be recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Docpappy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but terribly bulky/heavy
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the detailed and clear sounding music, however had to return it as I found it a bit too bulky and heavy for everyday use. I will wait till SONY releases a WH1000XM2 lite.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Sony 1000 xm2. Ordered and deleivered next day. After 15 days i returned them. The soud, battery life, build quality all are excellent. But there is one huge drawback especially for me. And that is these are too big to carry around especially in gym. I ordered 1 more triple driver in-ear buds and i am extremely happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Akml Shah

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant. Having done a lot of background research - ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Having done a lot of background research - I think I have made the right choice (certainly cost-wise) - even over the close Bose and Sennheiser rivals , both of ewhic I tried before purchase.r
customer_reviews.author: goodmusicchamp

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever had. The noise cancelling on the train or tube is sensational. Sound quality is awesome. Build is great... Nothing to fault these. And they're a Which Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Muso

customer_reviews.title: Great noise cancelling and sound, not too comfortable wearing
customer_reviews.text: I've used the noise canceling feature in the train (eurostar, thalys, regular train) and flights and it makes a world of difference, so I think its very good. It has more features such as ambient sound and audio controls which I don't use. There are two drawbacks I experienced: although very lightweight they are not comfortable enough to wear for a long time and the noise cancelling turns off automatically if the headphone is not connected to a device via Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: According to my partner - the best cans he's ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partners chirtsmas present and as he had used my Beats for so long I was a little anxious as to whether he liked them - I need not have worried he loves them - cant believe how they blank out the sound so well! One happy boy!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. L. A. Glaysher

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I would say these are the perfect headphones. As with most people i was choosing between these and Bose QC35. Sony has a bit better noise canceling in my opinion and more modern app which allows for customization, but are a bit less comfortable for long periods as they don't breathe as good but not a deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is impressive! lasts for at least 4 days of regular use (2-3 hours a day) I really like the ability to filter in ambient sound. The Bluetooth connectivity is also good as u can connect to multiple devices at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: Best NC and bad Microphone
customer_reviews.text: While the sound quality, and noise cancellation are awesome... But, it only connects to one device at a time, my 10 pound creative bluetooth speaker can connect to multiple devices at a time. Also the microphone sucks, so basically calling using this headphone is not recommended. At this price point this definitely not expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chetan Sandhir

customer_reviews.title: brilliant headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have water a long time to do this review as I wanted to give them a good test. I use these every day as I use them for watching TV and the sound is better as you almost get a good surround sound. I live in a house share and I use them to block everything out in the evening and relax in front of tv. I did a lot of research and came up to decide to buy the bose comfort or the Sony and glad I made tge right dission. They are comfortable for long periods. There the best set I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: antony bradly

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Superb sound quality and loads of features. I was in two minds as whether to these or Bose QC35. I went for these due to the additional features as there was little difference in sound quality between the two models. I haven't regretted it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. H

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Just incredible. I mean, you get what you pay for, but these are just epic. I work in an open office, and this allows my to completely block out all distractions even without music playing. Comfortable, light, and they charge fast. They get a bit warm on your ears, but to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Alexencov

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic...
customer_reviews.text: Omg if you are into complex music or love to hear your music without interruption or background noise this is a must. Initially thought too expensive when I first purchased but these are very special, don't regret the money...
customer_reviews.author: Genix

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: Absolute debacle. Connectivity to iPhone is a pure debacle. The thing barely connects, fails to recognize Spotify; feels like a mid-90s Bluetooth product in terms of connectivity. Sound is good but rest so poor I am returning it ASAP and reverting to a Bose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound, not the best comfort
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Supposed to be the best NC but doesnt work well in windy conditions. But I'm told thats the case with most ANC headphones. Cups are a bit small, but that can be fixed easily
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: By the best headphones I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, top-notch noise cancelling, outstanding battery life, very reliable bluetooth connecting, and solid software framework. An absolute winner with solid price/value ratio, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: László Mucsi

customer_reviews.title: Superb... But!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these headphones is very good. They are obviously well made and I like the design which is understated. The sound quality is superb with a sensible degree of bass and well balanced mids and highs. The app however is awful both in appearance and functionality. Please address this Sony.
customer_reviews.author: tim jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly and well packaged. Suberb headphones. Sound quality is amazing. Noise cancelling is suberb. The sound of the train to work just disappeared. Chose these over the Bose QC 2's and glad I did (after listening to music on both).
customer_reviews.author: Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality. Why didn't I buy it sooner. Sublime quiet bliss on planes trains and relaxing at home. The soundstage is expansive and detailed and the the noise cancelling ability amazing. It is not that light weight or portable, but it is over ear so that's expected. It comes with me on all holidays as essential hand luggage!
customer_reviews.author: Riaz Alam

customer_reviews.title: I have version 1 and I think it was a better noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: I have mrd-1000x and I'm not impressed with the noise cancellation of this model. It's a pity, because that aside, they look great, sound great and really comfortable. Still worth it
customer_reviews.author: eertdfygu

customer_reviews.title: My first premium headphones (£199)
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones and they're the best sounding headphones I've ever owned (high def sound capability). I like how with the noise cancelling feature, I am able to listen to music so clearly, without cranking up the sound and potentially damaging my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it needs to
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality. However, almost useless for calls. Everyone complains about the audio quality on calls, so I just use earphones instead. I found noise cancellation a bit weak, I'm sure there is better out there.
customer_reviews.author: Marko Santos Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them
customer_reviews.text: Fanastic battery life, clear punchy sound and effective noise reduction. Use these everyday on the train and have used them several times on long flights making them far more bearable. Have effectively made my Sennhesier Momentum Over ears redundant. The effective noise reduction means you dont need to have them anywhere as loud to enjoy the music. Cant recommend them highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: barneyrubble

customer_reviews.title: BEST N/C HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best on the market! Well haven't got the mark 3s yet! But for travelling e.g. on a plane it cancels out every noise you can think of. Had a kid crying behind me and couldn't hear that till my mum said it did her head in at the end of the flight so I wouldn't of known. The sound is also top quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Oakey

customer_reviews.title: Tried, tested and worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great quality headphones, superb sound quality and great range for bluetooth. Have yet to test on a flight
customer_reviews.author: B859

customer_reviews.title: Wish the battery was changeable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing but wish it had changeable batteries rather than one that will inevitably degrade over time when the rest of the product is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are fantastic. Music sounds great on them, perfect and the touch controls are really easy to operate. Noise cancelling is spot on, with every penny.
customer_reviews.author: nakka1973

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he has said they are the best present i've ever got him! He travels alot and loves that he can use them on planes (with the adaptor) as well as on the go. The sound quality is amazing, ive had a listen myself. Happy to recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Claire D.

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones on the market
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? These headphones are amazing! The noise cancelling is Second to none, and the sound quality Is amazing. If your considering another set? Don’t these are the ones for you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Love the amount of noise these cancel out. Sound is incredible. Touch controls are a little fiddly but love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Field

customer_reviews.title: Best sound out there
customer_reviews.text: Tried to skimp and save before buying these. There is no point, you get what you pay for - these offer peerless sound, the bass is rich, powerful, mids are clear, in short pricey, yes, but I suppose you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Dimitri Yates

customer_reviews.title: A bargain now.
customer_reviews.text: The best noise canceling phones I've ever had by a mile. Sound quality very good too.
customer_reviews.author: ian fox

product_meta.title: Sony WH-1000XM2 Wireless Bluetooth Over-Ear Noise Cancelling High Resolution Headphones with Gesture Control, Activity Recognition, 30 Hours Battery Life, with Alexa built-in - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black
No hassle, no difficult settings, just industry-leading noise cancellation* tailored for you and your life. 

Industry-leading noise cancellation is made even smarter with personal and atmospheric pressure optimising that adjusts to your individual listening style and your altitude. The WH-1000XM2 are therefore the perfect headphones to fly with. 

Be in control of your listening. Hear what’s important with Ambient Sound Control, and adjust sound levels with the Equalizer. What’s more? Smart Listening by Adaptive Sound Control automatically detects your activity such as travelling, walking, and waiting, then adjusts ambient sound settings to you. 

Enjoy truly authentic sound. Hear music that stays true to the original recording with High-Resolution Audio. Optimised for High-Resolution Audio, S-Master HX™ reduces distortion and allows you to enjoy all the subtleties in your music. These headphones also include a powerful 40mm driver with Liquid Crystal Polymer (LCP) diaphragm for handling heavy beats and can reproduce a full range of frequencies up to 40kHz. 

Wireless streaming is at its best with LDAC which transmits approximately three times more data (at the maximum transfer rate of 990 kbps) than conventional BLUETOOTH wireless audio, which allows you to enjoy High-Resolution Audio content in exceptional sound quality close to High Resolution Audio. 

With an incredible battery life of 30 hours, you can head out on long journeys with confidence of battery not running out. If you do run low on battery, the improved quick charge functionality gives you 70 minutes of play from just 10 minutes of charge - so even if you do run out, you'll have your headphones back up and running in no time. 

Combine high-quality sound with the simplicity of voice control. The WH-1000XM3 has dual voice assistant compatibility: it works with both Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa**. Play music, hear the news, control smart home devices, get answers to questions, and more just by talking to your headphones. 

*As of August 31st 2017. According to research by Sony Corporation, measured using JEITA-compliant guidelines in headband style wireless noise cancelling headphones market. 

**May depend on firmware update, available via the Headphones Connect App. 


BOX CONTAINS
Headphones
Carrying Case
Plug Adaptor for In-Flight Use
Connection Cable
USB Cable
Warranty Card
Operating Instructions
Reference Guide
feature_bullets: Industry-leading wireless noise cancellation (*Please see product description for disclaimer)
30 hours battery life with noise cancelling and quick charge feature
Quick Attention to immediately reduce volume to catch a conversation
Easy touch operation to control music playback and volume on the ear cup
Smart Auto-settings to optimize listening settings automatically based on user's behaviour
Optimized for the Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa for a seamless hands-free control and more
Alexa built-in devices let you instantly connect to Alexa to play music, control your smart home, get information, news, weather, and more using just your voice.
